compliance_assessment.framework_description: General Data Protection Regulation - A regulation in EU law on data protection and privacy in the European Union and the European Economic Area.

requirements.requirement: Obtain explicit consent from users for data processing.
requirements.evidence: User consent mechanisms are in place but need improvement.
gaps: No option to withdraw consent easily
recommendations: Implement clear and concise consent forms
Provide easy withdrawal options for users

requirements.requirement: Ensure data minimization and purpose limitation.
requirements.evidence: Data collection practices are not fully aligned with minimization principles.
gaps: No clear purpose for all collected data
recommendations: Limit data collection to what is necessary for functionality

requirements.requirement: Implement data protection by design and by default.
requirements.evidence: Some features are designed with privacy in mind, but not all.
recommendations: Adopt a privacy-first approach in all features
Ensure default settings prioritize user privacy

remediation_plan: Conduct a data audit to identify unnecessary data collection
Revise consent forms and processes to enhance clarity and user control
Implement training for development teams on privacy by design principles
